issue.title: Support JNI-based parquet write to write datasets into files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17752](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17752). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support JNI-based parquet write to write datasets into files.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17752?focusedCommentId=17605721) by Hongze Zhang (zhztheplayer):*
Duplicates ARROW-11776. I am assigning that issue to you.
